verbs.description: [ARG0: A woman] [R-ARG0: who] [V: fled] [ARG1: North Korea] [ARGM-TMP: decades ago] shared her story of pain and hope after this week 's historic summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un .
